title: CANARY PROTOCOL & the Sacred Order of Foolish Transparency
description:
Virtually Not Alone Network Celebration

Thanks for telling your friends!  The channel has finally reached the Gallows!
Come Celebrate!

in the desolate town of whispering

there was a notorious huckster by the
name of JD Ace McCree

as the days went on the connection

Forge a new future and Ace no longer
